scripts.build: rimraf dist && babel src --out-dir dist/js && copyfiles etc/** dist
scripts.dev-api: node --version && cross-env DEBUG=api:* MAIL_TEMPLATE_PATH=etc/api-tree/templates MAIL_CONFIG_PATH=../secured/api-tree REST_PATH=src/rest nodemon src/index.js --exec babel-node
scripts.test-api: cross-env DEBUG=test:*,api:* NODE_ENV=test PORT=9000 MAIL_TEMPLATE_PATH=etc/api-tree/templates MAIL_CONFIG_PATH=../secured/api-tree REST_PATH=src/rest mocha --recursive --require babel-register --exit "test/**/*.js"
scripts.test-init-db: cross-env DEBUG=api:* NODE_ENV=test mocha --exit test/scenarios/tu/testInitDb.js --require babel-register
scripts.start-db: sudo docker run -itd -p 27017:27017 -v /var/lib/blueforest/mongo/dev:/data/db -e MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME=doudou -e MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD=masta --restart unless-stopped mongo:latest
